Package main

Class Owner

java.lang.Object
main.Owner
public class Owner
extends java.lang.Object
The owner is a class that stores information about a property owner

    • registerProperty

      public boolean registerProperty​(java.lang.String eircode, java.lang.String address, int estMarketValue, java.lang.String locationCategory, java.lang.String principalPrivateRes)
      Registers property as owner's on the system
      Parameters:
      eircode - the String for eircode
      address - the String for address
      estMarketValue - the integer for the estimated market value of owner's property
      locationCategory - the String for location type of the property
      principalPrivateRes - the String for YES or NO depending whether property is a principal private residence of this owner
      Returns:
      true if registration successful, false otherwise
